No matter what, you always want to choose the best for your baby. But when it comes to selecting baby skincare products, picking just one is so very confusing. You unexpectedly find yourself turning to a sea of online reviews, taking recommendations and consulting doctors. Well, allow me to make your life a bit easier. Here are a few tips for you before you start shopping a skincare product: Read labels very carefully- Labels should be read carefully to make sure the Baby skin care products do not contain fragrances, dyes and chemicals. These can irritate a baby's skin and impact baby’s breathing.Opt for Natural and organic baby skin care products-Natural and organic skin care products are the safest and healthiest for your little ones. They are extracted directly from plant products as opposed to being produced synthetically.Prefer "hypoallergenic" products-Hypoallergenic means that the product is less likely to cause an allergic reaction. These products are therefore, gentler to the skin than non-hypoallergenic skincare products.Look for phthalate- and paraben-free products- Phthalate and Paraben are chemicals that are harmful for the skin of the baby and have been linked to a number of serious health concerns.Nuluv has U.S baby skincare brands that are natural, organic, hypoallergenic, phthalate and paraben free; not comprising fragrances, dyes and chemicals. Baby skin care products Here is my list of essential baby products: Baby Wash Make baby’s bath time fun by using a tear-free body wash. The body wash should be free of chemicals and should cleanse the baby’s body naturally. You should look for natural ingredients that gently clean and simultaneously moisturize your baby’s skin. Baby Shampoo Your baby’s shampoo should be like the body wash; safe and tear-free that gently cleans your baby’s scalp and hair. A baby shampoo with organic ingredients is chemical free, safe and natural and leaves scalp and hair shiny and clean. Baby Lotion For restoring and replenishing the natural oils of the baby’s body, baby lotion needs to be applied after bath. You should pick an effective baby lotion having richness of ingredients like chamomile, calendula, Shea Butter, Olive Fruit Oil and Vitamin E. All of these combat your baby’s dry skin and restore the lost moisture, keeping the baby’s skin smooth and soft. Natural Baby Powder Your baby’s folds should be kept dry for preventing them from rubbing and causing skin irritation. Choose Organic Aloe and Chamomile based talc-free baby powder which is safe for your baby’s skin and keeps your baby dry and cool. Diaper Rash Cream Every time diaper of your baby is changed, you need to make sure diaper rash cream is applied. Diaper cream protects the baby’s bottom from allergies and rashes. An itchy and sore bottom can make the baby uncomfortable and cranky the entire day. Diaper cream however; acts as a protective barrier against skin infections and wetness. You should look for the presence of Zinc Oxide in diaper cream because it is natural and it acts fast on rashes. Natural Sunscreen The American Association of Pediatrics recommend the usage of sunscreen for babies below 6 months and older. Apply natural mineral-based baby sunscreen specially formulated for babies. Also, check the ingredients to make sure that the sunscreen is organic.
